author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PILAR ACCELERATING WESTWARD AWAY FROM CENTRAL AMERICA...
summary:
...PILAR ACCELERATING WESTWARD AWAY FROM CENTRAL AMERICA...
 As of 4:00 PM CDT Wed Nov 1
 the center of Pilar was located near 12.4, -91.7
 with movement W at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 999 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.
